traits.name: Chaotic Strikes
traits.desc: When the chaos blade rolls a natural 1 or a critical hit with a weapon attack, it can immediately cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Improved Criticals
traits.desc: The chaos blade scores a critical hit with its weapon attacks on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Infused Strikes
traits.desc: The chaos blades weapons are infused with elemental energy and deal 2d6 additional cold, fire, or lightning damage on hit (chosen at random and included in the attack).

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The chaos blade is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The chaos blade has the following sorcerer spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): acid splash, blade ward, true strike * 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, color spray, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): blur, hold person, misty step * 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste

traits.name: War Caster
traits.desc: The chaos blade has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells and can cast spells while wielding a weapon in each hand.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chaos blade makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold, fire, or lightning damage (chosen randomly).

actions.name: Action Surge (1/Short Rest)
actions.desc: The chaos blade makes 3 shortsword attacks.
